description:
Landing.Porto is an INVITE-ONLY after-work event for the top 100 Tech Professionals in the Porto area.
This is Landing.jobs’ first ever event taking place in Porto! To celebrate this fact, our team has carefully chosen several companies that will showcase their culture, future projects, and technologies at the event.
As an attendee, you will have the opportunity to “sit in” on the jury to rate & give feedback on the company’s pitches :) All of this taking place on a BOAT right on the Douro river!
This is the perfect opportunity to engage and better understand what these hand-selected companies are working on, what technologies they are investing in, and who participates in creating the magic behind their tech team.
Here are the companies joining us for this night to remember:
- Xing
- Natixis
- Mindera
- Hostelworld
- Farfetch
- Talkdesk
When?
On the 7th of June.
Where?
On a boat! The meeting point and the check-in will be at Cais da Ribeira.
What's the agenda like?

18h00 - Check-in Starts
19h00 - Boat Departs
19h30 - Company's Pitches
21h00 / 21h30 - Snacks & Drinks
22h00 - Boat Returns *

* The organising team will probably go & eat a hot meal (Francesinha maybe?) afterwards - you're welcome to join!
All attendees are invited by the Landing.jobs team to make sure we onboard only the top 100 tech professionals within the Porto region. If you've paid for a ticket but your professional profile doesn't qualify, we'll fully refund the ticket value.
name: Landing.Porto
